CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, page 14, reads: "Evangelism and World Order - no finer class graced the sacred program of the congress than the one on evangelism and world order. This is a two and one class, taught by the Revs. F. L. Henley and J. E. Washington. Pictured here are, left to right: Gertrude Grier, Katie M. Bell, Lillian Hart, Evelyn Carter and Lottie Shoulty. Back row: Melvin Stewart, the Rev. F. L. Henley, Booker T. Hester and the Rev. John E. Washington."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait front row from left: Gertrude Grier, Katie M. Bell, Lillian Hart, Evelyn Carter, Lottie Shoulty; back row: Melvin Stewart, Reverend F. L. Henley, Booker T. Hester, and Reverend John E. Washington, standing on stairs in front of Mt. Zion Baptist Church
